painPoints: Tracking issue persists in both wireless and wired modes
The dongle on the first unit was non-functional
High price point ($150) for a product with these issues
improvementSuggestions: Improve sensor tracking reliability, especially at high polling rates
Enhance quality control to prevent shipping defective hardware (e.g., dongles)

positives: The product itself is considered flawless in terms of build/function
painPoints: The product is not worth the price
Does not offer a tangible performance benefit over cheaper alternatives
A user can perform equally well with a product that is half the price
improvementSuggestions: Re-evaluate the price point to offer better value for money
